description: phi(n) is equal to the sum of prime factors and exponents of n+1.
comments: Next term > 10^8. - _Naohiro Nomoto_, Jun 21 2001Next term > 10^9. - _Michel Marcus_, Jun 03 2014
prog: (PARI) isok(n) = (f = factor(n+1)) && (sum(i=1, #f~, f[i,2]) + sum(i=1, #f~, f[i,1]) == eulerphi(n)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jun 03 2014
